pages.text: In order to use spells, you need 3 components: Wand, Spellbook and Magic Writing Desk. All of them can be crafted with a crafting table.$(br2)One of the materials, Magiwoods, is the purple woods on overworld. They have magical power and used for various magical items.

After collecting them, place the desk and use.$(br)Put your wand in the top-left slot and spellbooks in the top-right 5 slots. After putting these items, just take the wand and spells are set.#(f00)Taking a wand without putting any spells will reset the spells already set to the wands.

You can cast spells by selecting the spells with $(k:next_skill) and $(k:back_skill) while holding the wands(selected spell is shown on the center of screen), and use the wand. It requires some mana.$(br)Using spells gives you experience and eventually level up, which increases your mana capacity and magical power, but...?
